description: Protests take place on Lesbos, Samos and Chios over the handling of people arriving from Turkey.
title: Greece migrant crisis: Islanders strike over crowded camps
title_page: Greece migrant crisis: Islanders strike over crowded camps - BBC News
maintext: "But we want the refugees and the immigrants to go to another place, to Greece or other parts of the EU," he told me. "More people are coming and just staying on our islands. They live in tents in inhuman conditions."
